meanings.definition: A type of bet in horse racing where the bettor selects the first two finishers in a race in any order.
meanings.sent1: I placed a quinellas bet on the horse race, choosing the top two finishers.
meanings.sent2: The quinellas wager allowed me to pick the first and second place horses in any order.
meanings.sent3: Trying to predict the quinellas outcome felt like solving a fun puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her accurate quinellas prediction was like hitting the jackpot.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of quinellas betting made the race even more thrilling.
